name: Pinball w/ a Twist
description:
Given the prompt "Pinball with a Twist" and the command "experiment!" this is a week long prototype.

The plan was to make a pinball game work with movable bumpers rather than typical flipping paddles. Initially I wanted the paddles to be controlled by different players so that it was a duel of sorts, but multiplayer was not implemented in time. Still, I think this serves as a proof of concept, and the next steps would be to get the multiplayer working, and make all elements of the board able to be moved around one at a time. Could make for an interesting Pinball Duel!
